scripts.policy:tokens-ban: rg -n "var\(--" src/app src/features --glob '!**/components/ui/**' --glob '!**/styles/**' --glob '!**/app/globals.css' && echo 'Tokens direct reference found' && exit 1 || echo 'OK'
scripts.policy:hardcolor-ban: rg -n "#([0-9a-fA-F]{3}|[0-9a-fA-F]{6})\b" src --glob '!**/styles/tokens.css' --glob '!**/*.md' && echo 'Hardcoded color found' && exit 1 || echo 'OK'
scripts.policy:rgba-hsla-ban: rg -n "rgba?\s*\(" src --glob '!**/styles/**' --glob '!**/*.md' && echo 'rgba found' && exit 1 || echo 'OK'; rg -n "hsla?\s*\(" src --glob '!**/styles/**' --glob '!**/*.md' && echo 'hsla found' && exit 1 || echo 'OK'
scripts.policy:check: npm run -s policy:tokens-ban && npm run -s policy:hardcolor-ban && npm run -s policy:rgba-hsla-ban
